mapper.select: select e.employeeNumber as empno, e.name as userName, (select cmNm from cmcd c where c.cmCd='position' and c2.cmNo=e.position) as position, (select cmNm from cmcd c1 where c1.cmCd='division' and c3.cmNo=e.division) as division, gender, joinDate from employee
select employeeNumber as empNo, name as userName, division, position, gender, joinDate from employee where name=#{userName}
mapper.update: update employee set division=#{division},position=#{position} where employeeNumber=#{empNo}
